code: import{JWT_AUTH_ACCESS_TOKEN}from"@utils/constants/important";var AUTH_TOKEN=JWT_AUTH_ACCESS_TOKEN;export function getJWTAuthToken(){return localStorage.getItem(AUTH_TOKEN)||"";}export function setTokenIntoCookies(token){localStorage.setItem(AUTH_TOKEN,token);}export function flushTokenFromCookies(){localStorage.removeItem(AUTH_TOKEN);}export function getAuthorizationHeader(){return"Bearer ".concat(getJWTAuthToken());}
